name: Nancy Pelosi
tweet_text: The Affordable Care Act continues to deliver on Democrats’ promise that affordable health care is a right, not a privilege. Starting today, families will be able to enroll in affordable, accessible and life-saving coverage for the new year in the 2022 ACA Open Enrollment Period.
